text: Kim and Kanye spent their anniversary eating pancakes and doing ` ` nothing.'' Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images The INSIDER Summary : Kim Kardashian told Allure magazine that she and husband Kanye West did ` ` absolutely nothing'' for their anniversary. She also said that they have a ` ` no gifts'' policy to keep themselves and their children grounded. It's great that these two are finding a balance that works for them. Kim Kardashian and Kanye West may be one of the most famous couples on the planet, but even they know that sometimes keeping things low - key is best.
